Author: Aleph0-4
Text: No advice sorry because I'm trying to relearn how to eat too. I either restrict or b/p. I haven't been able to eat intuitively for at least a year now. I have successfully increased the calories I allow myself though. I basically forced myself to do it and made it my goal for the entire day to eat lunch with my friend and not purge. Terrifying, exhausting but gets a lot easier the subsequent times
